topicTitle: I be gone for a bit...

posts.postText: Having girl problems, shit made me depressed. I won't be on for a couple of days or so... I know its nothing to be sad about but I really liked this girl and it seemed the same from her, but damn she told me she wanted to wait for college for a boyfriend supposedly... and well guess the rest, fuck, I'll be back once I can get over it.
Bye? We wont notice your gone :D

Come back soon. D:
Hope you forget about her

>> Bye? We wont notice your gone :D  Dick

I'll miss you Boom :(
LoL, fine... I won't notice... I rarely see him :(

>> Bye? We wont notice your gone :D 


You don't HAVE to be an ass about it.


Bye minge.

>> >> Bye? We wont notice your gone :D 


You don't HAVE to be an ass about it.


Bye minge. 


Well I was just saying.... like a couple days - a week isn't much? If it was a 2 weeks or more? That be noticable by even the community.  Most people wouldn't notice? Like I don't pay attention to whose missing in action and what not.

>> >> >> Bye? We wont notice your gone :D
